WorkItem.Description: Is there a way to use multiple styles in a cell?  I specifically looking to be able to highlight certain words with a color or superscript within a cell.

Comments.Message:
Do you mean Rich-Text? If so, yes, at least partially. Search for "Rich-Text" in the documentation.

Supports Rich-Text:
----
PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007
PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007

PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5

PHPExcel_Writer_HTML
PHPExcel_Writer_PDF

Does not support Rich-Text:
----
PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5  (see http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8916)
Yes I see it now in 05featuredemo.php.  Thanks for the quick reply and I'm look forward to using PHPExcel!
